title: Stylish Getaway in the Heart of the Montenegro Coast with Daily Dining Experiences
description: Dreaming of a Mediterranean escape without the crowds? Tucked away on the Adriatic Coast is Montenegro, a stunning country, home to beautiful beaches, medieval architecture and rich culture - perfect for a European getaway with a difference. Treat yourself to a stay at Meliá Budva Petrovac, a chic hotel where you can relax and unwind in style. Only a short stroll from the beach, it’s the perfect home base for you to explore everything this amazing destination has to offer. Enjoy daily Mediterranean buffet dinners, daily buffet breakfast, a welcome gift on arrival, a complimentary room upgrade and more.
